thread.title: Netizens in stitches as video of man evading toll on a skateboard goes viral - NewsBreak
thread.title_full: Netizens in stitches as video of man evading toll on a skateboard goes viral - NewsBreak

author: Atreyee sen
title: Netizens in stitches as video of man evading toll on a skateboard goes viral - NewsBreak
text:
By Atreyee sen ,
52 minutes ago
Netizens can't stop laughing after a video of a man evading toll on a skateboard surfaced on X. The reactions to this video are absolutely hilarious as fans are struck by a jolt of surprise, humor, and awe. The way the skater suddenly slid down into the floor and went straight to the elevator evading the toll right in front using no superpowers but a skateboard, sent everyone in laughing stitches.
The quirky appeal of the video is in its simplicity and unpredictability. Toll booths, mean you have to wait and follow the process duly. But this daring person skipped this tedious part of travel and chose to glide it all away in style.
The unexpected move gave many netizens a necessary boost of thrill and excitement. For many, the video serves as a reminder that fun can be found anywhere. It takes just a skateboard to begin.
Beyond the laughs, the quirky video throws light on how when it comes to internet laughter, no incident is too small to go unnoticed. Moments like these bring vibrancy and a taste of change while we live an otherwise mundane and monotonous life.
While netizens keep the comment section abuzz with their signature humor, memes, and jokes, we have picked the best ones for you.
Netizens in stitches as video of man evading toll on a skateboard goes viral A humorous comment ensued, (Via @SupahAndre/X)
Now that’s how you get around indoors A netizen humorously chimed in, (Via @MT_Simmons/X)
Sorry, that shouldn't even be illegal. The metro should just update their policies Either pay for your pass OR jump it in STYLE both are accepted as payment Someone else humorously pointed out, (Via @LeftistLunatics/X)
Humans are amazing but especially when avoiding toll booths Another user humorously remarked, (Via @Headlines_Fix/X)
I despise fair jumping, but this guy earned his free ride Another social media user joked,
Everyone around him is acting like that’s normal. You’re watching an elite performance To top things off, here are a few funny gifs for you!
Someone playfully joked, (Via @HumansNoContext/X)
As the clip continues to gain more attention, it has taken a life on its own. In no time, moments like these get cemented in pop cultural history.
The visual punchline is the moment he jumps over the toll gate sitting right in front of him. Fans are wondering, how he has mastered the necessary skill. Humor in many ways is derived from tragedy, and when scenes like these unfold, we surely feel better. They are also thinking of becoming his fans in the comment section.
